against acute respiratory illness (OR=6.1 vs. OR=2.4), but breastfeeding between 6–11 months

vs. OR=2.5) (3 studies) ( 42). However, few studies have specifically examined the effect of 
breastfeeding beyond 12 months on these outcomes.
Actions to protect, promote and support continued breastfeeding
The actions summarized in the section on EBF (pages 12–15)
